daily_plan_req: 1. Wake up at 6:00 am and complete morning routine, 2. Prepare and have breakfast at 7:00 am, 3. Open Hobbs Cafe at 8:00 am and work at the counter until 3:00 pm, 4. Take care of any errands or tasks related to Hobbs Cafe at 4:00 pm and have a snack at 5:00 pm, 5. Finalize preparations for the Valentine's Day party at 4:00 pm, 6. Host the Valentine's Day party at Hobbs Cafe from 5:00 pm to 7:00 pm.
name: Isabella Rodriguez
learned: Isabella Rodriguez is a cafe owner of Hobbs Cafe who loves to make people feel welcome. She is always looking for ways to make the cafe a place where people can come to relax and enjoy themselves.
currently: Status: Isabella Rodriguez plans to follow her usual routine on Friday, February 17. She will wake up at 6:00 am, complete her morning routine, prepare breakfast at 6:30 am, and open Hobbs Cafe at 8:00 am. She will work at the counter until 3:00 pm, take a break for lunch at 12:00 pm, and work again after lunch until 3:00 pm. At 4:00 pm, she will take care of any errands or tasks that need to be done for Hobbs Cafe and have a snack at 5:00 pm. She is looking forward to continuing with her routines for the next few days and reassessing her schedule after that.
lifestyle: Isabella Rodriguez goes to bed around 11pm, awakes up around 6am.
